[[File:TradeStone.png|thumb|200px|The Trade Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Trade Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Fuschia City]] in [[Kanto]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Graveler || | Golem |- | Kadabra || | Alakazam |- | Machoke || | Machamp |- | Haunter || | Gengar |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
